content.question: Robert Smithson chose the motif of the spiral for his earthwork Spiral Jetty because its shape

choices.label: represented for him the idea of human progress
symbolized to him the natural cycle of creation and decay
would promote interaction among visitors walking its path
increased the stability of the natural materials used

content.answer: symbolized to him the natural cycle of creation and decay

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
